product_name: Cane Creek Thudbuster ST Suspension Seatpost
long_description: Offering a cushioned ride, the Cane Creek Thudbuster ST suspension seatpost takes the edge off rough trails and roads with a durable and responsive design. Whether riding long, rough roads or ripping down cross-country trails, the Thudbuster offers added comfort for any bike. Short travel (ST) version provides up to 1.3 in. (33 mm) of travel to cushion impacts, absorb bumps and smooth out uneven surfaces. Travel is achieved using a patented, continuously-responsive parallel-linkage design paired with a single urethane elastomer. User-serviceable linkage pivots have stainless-steel axles with Teflon(R) coated bushings for enhanced longevity. Includes soft, medium and firm elastomers so you can easily tune suspension feel and response. Recommended maximum rider weight: 250 lbs.
short_description: Offering a cushioned ride, the Cane Creek Thudbuster ST suspension seatpost takes the edge off rough trails and roads with a durable and responsive design.
